name: SetPlayerPos
notes: Using this function on a player in a vehicle will instantly remove them from the vehicle. Useful for quickly ejecting players.
tips: When setting a player's position to an interior, their interior must be set also.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to set the position of.

params_body.name: Float:x
params_body.description: The X coordinate to position the player at.

params_body.name: Float:y
params_body.description: The Y coordinate to position the player at.

params_body.name: Float:z
params_body.description: The Z coordinate to position the player at.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. This means the player specified does not exist.
related_fn:
SetPlayerPosFindZ: Set a player's position and find the ground.
 GetPlayerPos: Get a player's position.
 SetVehiclePos: Set the position of a vehicle.
 GetVehiclePos: Get the position of a vehicle.
